hints.label: thm-emergent-general-relativity
hints.title: Emergent General Relativity (Main Result)
hints.content:
1911: :label: thm-emergent-general-relativity
1912: 
1913: The mean-field limit of the Fractal Set dynamics satisfies Einstein's field equations:
1914: 
1915: $$
1916: R_{\mu\nu} - \frac{1}{2}R g_{\mu\nu} = 8\pi G \, T_{\mu\nu}
1917: 
1918: $$
1919: 
1920: where:
1921: 
1922: 1. **Metric** $g_{\mu\nu} = H_{\mu\nu} + \varepsilon \delta_{\mu\nu}$ emerges from fitness Hessian ([08_emergent_geometry.md](08_emergent_geometry.md))
1923: 
1924: 2. **Ricci tensor** $R_{\mu\nu}$ is computed from scutoid plaquette holonomy ([15_scutoid_curvature_raychaudhuri.md](15_scutoid_curvature_raychaudhuri.md))
1925: 
1926: 3. **Stress-energy** $T_{\mu\nu}$ is the expectation of walker four-momentum flux over the McKean-Vlasov measure ({prf:ref}`def-stress-energy-continuum`)
1927: 
1928: 4. **Interaction kernel proportionality** $K_\varepsilon(x,y) \propto V_{\text{fit}}(x) \cdot V_{\text{fit}}(y)$ is proven via extended fluctuation-dissipation theorem applied to cloning dynamics ({prf:ref}`thm-interaction-kernel-fitness-proportional`)
1929: 
1930: 5. **Conservation** $\nabla_\mu T^{\mu\nu} = 0$ at QSD follows from detailed balance and force compensation ({prf:ref}`cor-force-balance-fdt-qsd`), proven rigorously using FDT
1931: 
1932: 6. **Proportionality** $G_{\mu\nu} = 8\pi G T_{\mu\nu}$ follows from Raychaudhuri-mediated consistency ({prf:ref}`thm-einstein-field-equations`)
1933: 
1934: 7. **Gravitational constant** $G = \ell_{\text{typ}}^d/(8\pi N T)$ is derived from dimensional matching ({prf:ref}`prop-gravitational-constant`)
hints.raw_directive:
1908: ### 6.1. What We Have Proven
1909: 
1910: :::{prf:theorem} Emergent General Relativity (Main Result)
1911: :label: thm-emergent-general-relativity
1912: 
1913: The mean-field limit of the Fractal Set dynamics satisfies Einstein's field equations:
1914: 
1915: $$
1916: R_{\mu\nu} - \frac{1}{2}R g_{\mu\nu} = 8\pi G \, T_{\mu\nu}
1917: 
1918: $$
1919: 
1920: where:
1921: 
1922: 1. **Metric** $g_{\mu\nu} = H_{\mu\nu} + \varepsilon \delta_{\mu\nu}$ emerges from fitness Hessian ([08_emergent_geometry.md](08_emergent_geometry.md))
1923: 
1924: 2. **Ricci tensor** $R_{\mu\nu}$ is computed from scutoid plaquette holonomy ([15_scutoid_curvature_raychaudhuri.md](15_scutoid_curvature_raychaudhuri.md))
1925: 
1926: 3. **Stress-energy** $T_{\mu\nu}$ is the expectation of walker four-momentum flux over the McKean-Vlasov measure ({prf:ref}`def-stress-energy-continuum`)
1927: 
1928: 4. **Interaction kernel proportionality** $K_\varepsilon(x,y) \propto V_{\text{fit}}(x) \cdot V_{\text{fit}}(y)$ is proven via extended fluctuation-dissipation theorem applied to cloning dynamics ({prf:ref}`thm-interaction-kernel-fitness-proportional`)
1929: 
1930: 5. **Conservation** $\nabla_\mu T^{\mu\nu} = 0$ at QSD follows from detailed balance and force compensation ({prf:ref}`cor-force-balance-fdt-qsd`), proven rigorously using FDT
1931: 
1932: 6. **Proportionality** $G_{\mu\nu} = 8\pi G T_{\mu\nu}$ follows from Raychaudhuri-mediated consistency ({prf:ref}`thm-einstein-field-equations`)
1933: 
1934: 7. **Gravitational constant** $G = \ell_{\text{typ}}^d/(8\pi N T)$ is derived from dimensional matching ({prf:ref}`prop-gravitational-constant`)
1935:

hints.label: prop-testable-predictions-gr
hints.title: Testable Predictions from Emergent GR
hints.content:
1976: :label: prop-testable-predictions-gr
1977: 
1978: 1. **Lorentz violation at Planck scale**: Dispersion relation modifications:
1979: 
1980: $$
1981: E^2 = p^2 c^2 + m^2 c^4 + \alpha \frac{E^3}{\ell_{\text{Planck}} c^2}
1982: 
1983: $$
1984:    Observable in gamma-ray bursts, ultra-high-energy cosmic rays
1985: 
1986: 2. **Discreteness effects in gravitational waves**: High-frequency modes ($\omega \gtrsim \ell_{\text{Planck}}^{-1}$) experience dispersion
1987: 
1988: 3. **Modified black hole thermodynamics**: Entropy corrections from discrete causal structure
1989: 
1990: 4. **Cosmological phase transitions**: Early universe transitions between exploration/exploitation regimes
hints.raw_directive:
1973: If the Fractal Set framework describes physical reality at the Planck scale, several predictions follow:
1974: 
1975: :::{prf:proposition} Testable Predictions from Emergent GR
1976: :label: prop-testable-predictions-gr
1977: 
1978: 1. **Lorentz violation at Planck scale**: Dispersion relation modifications:
1979: 
1980: $$
1981: E^2 = p^2 c^2 + m^2 c^4 + \alpha \frac{E^3}{\ell_{\text{Planck}} c^2}
1982: 
1983: $$
1984:    Observable in gamma-ray bursts, ultra-high-energy cosmic rays
1985: 
1986: 2. **Discreteness effects in gravitational waves**: High-frequency modes ($\omega \gtrsim \ell_{\text{Planck}}^{-1}$) experience dispersion
1987: 
1988: 3. **Modified black hole thermodynamics**: Entropy corrections from discrete causal structure
1989: 
1990: 4. **Cosmological phase transitions**: Early universe transitions between exploration/exploitation regimes
1991:
